course_name: Artificial Intelligence for Real World Application
summary: Artificial Intelligence for Real World Application is a comprehensive course designed to build strong foundational knowledge in this important area. This subject covers 7 key modules that progressively develop your understanding. You'll gain both theoretical insights and practical skills through lectures and assignments. The course prepares you for advanced studies and professional applications. Mastering this subject will significantly contribute to your academic and career success.
recommended_books: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning – Chandra S.S.V.
A First Course in Artificial Intelligence – Deepak Khemani
course_outcomes: Define core AI concepts and tools and their applications.
Understand and compare search and reasoning techniques in AI.
Apply AI techniques to develop ML and DL models for real problems.
Select and analyze time series methods in AI.
Evaluate TensorFlow implementations for regression and clustering.
prerequisites: Knowledge of OOPs, Basic knowledge of Sensors
